alert.note: Alert for Faulkner; Perry; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 6:17PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Perry, southwestern Faulkner, north central Saline and northwestern Pulaski Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 617 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Williams Junction, or 10 miles southwest of Perryville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Perryville... Houston... Little Italy... Wye Mountain... Williams Junction... Roland in Pulaski County... Bigelow... Fourche... Antioch in Perry County... Wye... Oak Grove in Perry County... New Dixie... Long Mountain... Thornburg... Pleasant Valley in Perry County... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central Arkansas.
